Rulings.Edison:
● Like most Trap cards, this card can miss the timing. 
For example, if "Jar of Greed" was activated, 
and "Call of the Haunted" is chained to it, 
this card can't be activated when that monster was Summoned, 
as the Summon was not the last thing to happen 
(Jar of Greed drawing a card was).
You can read more about Timing here:
https://edisonformat.net/rules/compendium/missing-the-timing

https://edisonformat.net/rules/compendium/missing-the-timing
Rulings.Goat:
●Torrential Tribute is activated after a monster is Summoned; it is not chained to the Summon. So you cannot activate Torrential Tribute when Jinzo is Summoned.
●Torrential Tribute can be activated after a monster is Summoned through another card’s effect, such as Monster Reborn, Scapegoat, Cyber Jar (if Flip Summoned), or Call of the Haunted.
●Torrential Tribute can be activated after a Flip Summon, but it does not negate the Flip Effect (it is chained to the Flip Effect).
●Torrential Tribute cannot be activated during the Damage Step. This prohibits Torrential Tribute from being used against monsters Special Summoned by Mystic Tomato, Giant Rat, Nimble Momonga, Masked Dragon, and other such cards that Special Summon a monster when destroyed by battle, as well as Cyber Jar or Morphing Jar #2 that is flipped face-up by an attack.

Rulings.Cat:
● 'Torrential Tribute' is activated after a monster is Summoned; it isn't chained to the Summon. So you can't activate 'Torrential Tribute' when 'Jinzo' is Summoned.
● 'Torrential Tribute' can be activated after a monster is Summoned through another card’s effect, such as 'Monster Reborn', 'Scapegoat', 'Cyber Jar' (if Flip Summoned), or 'Call of the Haunted'.
● 'Torrential Tribute' can be activated after a Flip Summon, but it does not negate the Flip Effect (it is chained to the Flip Effect).
● 'Torrential Tribute' can't be activated during the Damage Step. This prohibits 'Torrential Tribute' from being used against monsters Special Summoned by 'Mystic Tomato', 'Giant Rat', 'Nimble Momonga', 'Masked Dragon', and other such cards that Special Summon a monster when destroyed as a result of battle, as well as 'Cyber Jar' or 'Morphing Jar #2' that is flipped face-up by an attack.
● When monsters are Special Summoned face-down by an effect, like 'The Shallow Grave', 'Torrential Tribute' can be activated.

Rulings.Base:
1. "Torrential Tribute" is activated after a monster is Summoned; it is not chained to the Summon. So you cannot activate "Torrential Tribute" when "Jinzo" is Summoned.
2. "Torrential Tribute" can be activated after a monster is Summoned through another card's effect, such as "Monster Reborn", "Scapegoat", "Cyber Jar" (if Flip Summoned), or "Call of the Haunted".
3. "Torrential Tribute" can be activated after a Flip Summon, but it does not negate the Flip Effect (it is chained to the Flip Effect).
4. "Torrential Tribute" cannot be activated during the Damage Step. This prohibits "Torrential Tribute" from being used against monsters Special Summoned by "Mystic Tomato", "Giant Rat", "Nimble Momonga", "Masked Dragon", and other such cards that Special Summon a monster when destroyed as a result of battle, as well as "Cyber Jar" or "Morphing Jar #2" that is flipped face-up by an attack.
